attributes.additional_details:
The NHS and Government infected over 5000 haemophiliacs with the killer virus Hepatitis C, this was as a direct result of using infected blood products for our treatment.
Despite a few feeble attempts by government to deal with this disaster this Government has failed to address this issue and the deaths of more than 2000 haemophiliacs as a direct result.
This government has now left more than 83% of those infected, living a life of poverty and hardship, struggling to make ends meet.
We saw over £10 million spent for Mrs Thatchers funeral, while the victims of this disaster cannot afford the cost of their own because what they are now forced to live on, and even this is now being targeted by the welfare reforms that will see this income reduced for many of the victims.
Please signe this petition in support of this government dealing with this disaster in a manner that will   bring an end to the poverty, pain, hardship and suffering.
